name: no night :: a solar music garden
name_original: no night :: a solar music garden
description:
////https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/45/no-night-a-solar-music-garden////

~

a solar system gardening music sandbox

planets and plants alike sing together in the music of the heavens

~

right-click to switch planets  |  scroll to zoom in/out  |  harvest plants w/ the scythe to get more resources

~

note: each plant plays a random note at a random rhythm, but will sing consistently once planted so if you want a different note or rhythm, just destroy it and plant a new one!

hint: if you're stuck at the beginning, just remember the name of the game! you got this.
